Error: Web app manifest does not meet the installability requirements
Error Description: Browsers can proactively prompt users to add your app to their homescreen, which can lead to higher engagement. [Learn more](https://web.dev/installable-manifest/).

Error: Is not configured for a custom splash screen
Error Description: A themed splash screen ensures a high-quality experience when users launch your app from their homescreens. [Learn more](https://web.dev/splash-screen/).

Error: Manifest doesn't have a maskable icon
Error Description: A maskable icon ensures that the image fills the entire shape without being letterboxed when installing the app on a device. [Learn more](https://web.dev/maskable-icon-audit/).

Error: Does not register a service worker that controls page and `start_url`
Error Description: The service worker is the technology that enables your app to use many Progressive Web App features, such as offline, add to homescreen, and push notifications. [Learn more](https://web.dev/service-worker/).

Error: Current page does not respond with a 200 when offline
Error Description: If you're building a Progressive Web App, consider using a service worker so that your app can work offline. [Learn more](https://web.dev/works-offline/).

Error: Does not set a theme color for the address bar.
Error Description: The browser address bar can be themed to match your site. [Learn more](https://web.dev/themed-omnibox/).

Error: `start_url` does not respond with a 200 when offline
Error Description: A service worker enables your web app to be reliable in unpredictable network conditions. [Learn more](https://web.dev/offline-start-url/).

Error: Image elements do not have explicit `width` and `height`
Error Description: Set an explicit width and height on image elements to reduce layout shifts and improve CLS. [Learn more](https://web.dev/optimize-cls/#images-without-dimensions)

Error: Does not provide a valid `apple-touch-icon`
Error Description: For ideal appearance on iOS when users add a progressive web app to the home screen, define an `apple-touch-icon`. It must point to a non-transparent 192px (or 180px) square PNG. [Learn More](https://web.dev/apple-touch-icon/).

Error: Reduce the impact of third-party code
Error Description: Third-party code can significantly impact load performance. Limit the number of redundant third-party providers and try to load third-party code after your page has primarily finished loading. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/optimizing-content-efficiency/loading-third-party-javascript/).

Error: Browser errors were logged to the console
Error Description: Errors logged to the console indicate unresolved problems. They can come from network request failures and other browser concerns. [Learn more](https://web.dev/errors-in-console/)

Error: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
Error Description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn more](https://web.dev/color-contrast/).

Error: Does not use passive listeners to improve scrolling performance
Error Description: Consider marking your touch and wheel event listeners as `passive` to improve your page's scroll performance. [Learn more](https://web.dev/uses-passive-event-listeners/).

Error: Heading elements are not in a sequentially-descending order
Error Description: Properly ordered headings that do not skip levels convey the semantic structure of the page, making it easier to navigate and understand when using assistive technologies. [Learn more](https://web.dev/heading-order/).

Error: Does not use HTTPS
Error Description: All sites should be protected with HTTPS, even ones that don't handle sensitive data. This includes avoiding [mixed content](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/security/prevent-mixed-content/what-is-mixed-content), where some resources are loaded over HTTP despite the initial request being servedover HTTPS. HTTPS prevents intruders from tampering with or passively listening in on the communications between your app and your users, and is a prerequisite for HTTP/2 and many new web platform APIs. [Learn more](https://web.dev/is-on-https/).

Error: `<frame>` or `<iframe>` elements do not have a title
Error Description: Screen reader users rely on frame titles to describe the contents of frames. [Learn more](https://web.dev/frame-title/).

Error: Ensure text remains visible during webfont load
Error Description: Leverage the font-display CSS feature to ensure text is user-visible while webfonts are loading. [Learn more](https://web.dev/font-display/).

Error: Includes front-end JavaScript libraries with known security vulnerabilities
Error Description: Some third-party scripts may contain known security vulnerabilities that are easily identified and exploited by attackers. [Learn more](https://web.dev/no-vulnerable-libraries/).

Error: Links to cross-origin destinations are unsafe
Error Description: Add `rel="noopener"` or `rel="noreferrer"` to any external links to improve performance and prevent security vulnerabilities. [Learn more](https://web.dev/external-anchors-use-rel-noopener/).

Error: Reduce initial server response time
Error Description: Keep the server response time for the main document short because all other requests depend on it. [Learn more](https://web.dev/time-to-first-byte/).

Error: Document does not have a meta description
Error Description: Meta descriptions may be included in search results to concisely summarize page content. [Learn more](https://web.dev/meta-description/).

Error: Largest Contentful Paint
Error Description: Largest Contentful Paint marks the time at which the largest text or image is painted. [Learn More](https://web.dev/lighthouse-largest-contentful-paint/)

Error: First Meaningful Paint
Error Description: First Meaningful Paint measures when the primary content of a page is visible. [Learn more](https://web.dev/first-meaningful-paint/).

Error: Page load is not fast enough on mobile networks
Error Description: A fast page load over a cellular network ensures a good mobile user experience. [Learn more](https://web.dev/load-fast-enough-for-pwa/).

Error: Speed Index
Error Description: Speed Index shows how quickly the contents of a page are visibly populated. [Learn more](https://web.dev/speed-index/).

Error: Estimated Input Latency
Error Description: Estimated Input Latency is an estimate of how long your app takes to respond to user input, in milliseconds, during the busiest 5s window of page load. If your latency is higher than 50 ms, users may perceive your app as laggy. [Learn more](https://web.dev/estimated-input-latency/).

Error: Total Blocking Time
Error Description: Sum of all time periods between FCP and Time to Interactive, when task length exceeded 50ms, expressed in milliseconds. [Learn more](https://web.dev/lighthouse-total-blocking-time/).

Error: Max Potential First Input Delay
Error Description: The maximum potential First Input Delay that your users could experience is the duration of the longest task. [Learn more](https://web.dev/lighthouse-max-potential-fid/).

Error: First CPU Idle
Error Description: First CPU Idle marks the first time at which the page's main thread is quiet enough to handle input.  [Learn more](https://web.dev/first-cpu-idle/).

Error: Time to Interactive
Error Description: Time to interactive is the amount of time it takes for the page to become fully interactive. [Learn more](https://web.dev/interactive/).

Error: Displays images with incorrect aspect ratio
Error Description: Image display dimensions should match natural aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://web.dev/image-aspect-ratio/).

Error: Minimize main-thread work
Error Description: Consider reducing the time spent parsing, compiling and executing JS. You may find delivering smaller JS payloads helps with this. [Learn more](https://web.dev/mainthread-work-breakdown/)

Error: Registers an `unload` listener
Error Description: The `unload` event does not fire reliably and listening for it can prevent browser optimizations like the Back-Forward Cache. Consider using the `pagehide` or `visibilitychange` events instead. [Learn More](https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2018/07/page-lifecycle-api#the-unload-event)

Error: `[aria-*]` attributes are not valid or misspelled
Error Description: Assistive technologies, like screen readers, can't interpret ARIA attributes with invalid names. [Learn more](https://web.dev/aria-valid-attr/).

Error: `[user-scalable="no"]` is used in the `<meta name="viewport">` element or the `[maximum-scale]` attribute is less than 5.
Error Description: Disabling zooming is problematic for users with low vision who rely on screen magnification to properly see the contents of a web page. [Learn more](https://web.dev/meta-viewport/).

Error: Avoid an excessive DOM size
Error Description: A large DOM will increase memory usage, cause longer [style calculations](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/rendering/reduce-the-scope-and-complexity-of-style-calculations), and produce costly [layout reflows](https://developers.google.com/speed/articles/reflow). [Learn more](https://web.dev/dom-size/).

Error: Links are not crawlable
Error Description: Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn More](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

Error: Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes
Error Description: Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more](https://web.dev/image-alt/).
